descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
"Welcome to 'Real Carrom', where tradition meets modern gaming. Engage in one of the most beloved board games with a virtual reality enhancement.

🔳 Game Modes:

Black and White: Stay true to the classic Carrom game, where you're assigned either black or white coins and must pocket them before your opponent.
Freestyle: Flexibility is key. Pocket any coin and rack up those points against your competition.
🔳 Single Player:
Test your skills against our AI opponents. Whether you're playing solo, partnering with an AI, or challenging multiple AIs, there's a level for everyone.

🔳 Multiplayer Magic:
Experience multiplayer like never before. Play one-on-one, team up with a friend against two AIs, or embrace the challenge of player + AI versus player + AI matches.

🔳 Immersive Features:

Voice Chat: Communicate with your opponents in real-time.
Oculus Avatars: Customize and flaunt your unique avatar.
Lip-Sync: Experience enhanced realism with lip-sync features.
Rediscover the joy of Carrom, whether you're a seasoned player or a newcomer. With intuitive controls, lifelike interactions, and multiple game modes, 'Real Carrom' promises endless fun and challenges. Ready to strike?"
